data.text: @DamoXX Hola Damian, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@katefroehlich46 Sorry, Kate. We kindly ask you to please get back to us in case you don't receive the checks within 21 days. Apologies
@Pablito_CA21 Hola Pablito, it depends of the time of the day, you can check the information at: https://t.co/8hbrssGft9. Regards.

@katefroehlich46 We're deeply sorry, Kate. Our colleagues sent you an email today about the checks. You should receive the first check shortly, since it was sent to you in july 26. The other two checks, unfortunately, will take a little longer. Apologies
@Malvent Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs. Best regards

@Pablito_CA21 Hola Pablito, yes, since you have two separate tickets, you need pass through the passport control in Spain. If you are travelling with checked bags, you'll have to collect the bags in Spain and make a new check-in. Regards

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @infrequentuser Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@stephenMciner12 Sorry, Stephen, We've replied your new DM
@MichaelChrysta5 Hola Michael, the claims department might take up to 7 business days to get back to you by email. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@starsurveyer Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DM. Best regards
@chicago_canada Hola Brent, in order to help, please send us the details of your request, your booking code, last name, e-ticket number, and email address to check the available options? Thank you.
@stephenMciner12 Hello Stephen, could you send us the details by DM? Thank you.
@siddhur Thank you.
@HugoAlb66460678 Hola, Hugo, nos comentan los compañeros que necesitan el código postal de la entidad bancaria para proceder con el pago por el extravío. Gracias
@siddhur Hola Siddhart, could you send us the details, your complete name and the booking code by DM? Thank you.
@Malvent Hola Marcelo, could you send us the file number by DM to check the available updates? Thank you.
@allabouttiffany Tiffany, as we told you before, you can contact them by the claim form. Regards
@allabouttiffany Hola Tiffany, we are sorry to read this, we have replied before by DM all details of the process. Regards
@fkmanfk1 Hola Jack, thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards

@Malvent Hola Marcelo. If you already submitted a claim form, our colleagues have up to 15 to 21 days (business) to get back to you by email. We appreciate your patience,  If you do not have any response after these days, please come back to us. 
Kind regards.

@martineznourdin Hola Christopher, to check the status of your request, please send us a DM with the file number associated with the claim and your full name. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@tori_james Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Baggage in the hold - Iberia
urls.description: Checked-in baggage means the baggage items that have been checked in to travel in the hold of the plane and certain limits are established, which you must be aware of.

data.text: @tori_james Hola, if your flight will be operated by us, please check the price table after using our baggage calculator https://t.co/Ry0quHlD0v . Kind regards
@ClaudiaKattan2 Hola Claudia, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DM. Best regards
@LiviaMinoja Hola Livia, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your new DM. Kind regards
@f_ziller Hola Álvaro, no podríamos indicar nada distinto. Has de solicitar todos los detalles y seguimiento directamente a tu agencia de viajes. Saludos
@eladgaf Hola, tendrías que consultar las condiciones de uso del bono directamente con Iberia express que entendemos es quién te lo ha otorgado. Saludos

@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, sorry to read this. As informed by email back in july 27, the first check was issued on july 26 and it might take from one week to 45 days for you to receive it. So, we understand that you'll receive it shortly. We appreciate your patience. Best regards

@f_ziller Hola Alvaro, sentimos no poder indicarte algo diferente, ya que realizaste la compra con agencia debes gestionarlo directamente con ellos, si necesitan consultar algo con nosotros lo harán por medio de los canales habilitados para ello. Saludos.

@f_ziller Hola Alvaro, desconocemos los detalles del incidente; sin embargo, te informamos que si tu reserva fue emitida por una agencia de viajes deberás contactar con la misma para realizar cualquier tipo de gestión. Saludos.
@OneByJuan Hola Juan, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rickeard Hola, we've located your original claim and have just replied your DM. Regards
@ArielMWarren Hola Ariel, we're deeply sorry to read this and have just replied your DM. Best regards
@LiviaMinoja Hola Livia, we sent you a DM. Thank you.
@LiviaMinoja Hola Livia, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Beanofire We've just replied your DMs. Please check
@Beanofire Hola Grant, did you opened a report at the airport? Please send us all the details by DM. Thank you.
@vahidmazdeh Hola Vahid, we will follow the case with the report holder. Regards.
@katefroehlich46 Hello Kate, we sent you an email with important information about your case, please confirm if you got it. Thank you!

urls.title: Documentation for air travel - Iberia
urls.description: It is a basic minimum requirement to have the appropriate documentation for travelling by plane and this is the personal responsibility of each passenger

data.text: @doshijatin Hola, You can check our guide at: https://t.co/JPRqnu92OB, or consult with the authorities of your destination country. Thank you.

@varsha_gurmeet Hola Varsha, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us all details by DM including, booking code, ticket number,registered email and full passenger names to verify the information? thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@amblegolas Hola John, wea re sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. We'll continue through that channel. Regards
@Anduaen Thank you for your comment Anduaen, we hope you have a good flight. ¡Regards!
@malakatonez Hola. Sentimos las molestias ocasionadas. Esperamos poder asistirte en alguna otra consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.
@malakatonez Hola. Disculpa, entendemos que, estas intentando realizar el Check In ¿Has intentado ingresar desde otros navegadores o dispositivos? Déjanos saber. Saludos,
@malakatonez Hola. ¿Nos podrías enviar por favor un DM, con la inquietud que tienes para que podamos asistirte por este medio? Quedamos atentos, saludos.
@GunjanPoudyal Hola, could you send us more details by DM, please? Regards.
@MichaelChrysta5 Thank you Michael, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@vahidmazdeh Hola Vahid, did you get a PIR number (property irregularity report) at the airport? If so, could you provide us the details and your full name by DM, please? Regards.
@AimeeHairon Hola Aimee, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@WestStandTone if you didn't get this PIR number you have to contact with the airline that operated your las flight. Kind regards. /2

@WestStandTone Hola, to proceed with delay baggage, you have to open a formal claim in the Arrivals Hall at the Airport (at the moment you arrive), at the counter of the airline that operated the last flight so you can open a case and get a PIR number (Property Irregularity Report) /1
@B_0_R_T Hola Bort, Have you opened a case? Please send us more details about your case by DM and the case number if you have one. Regards.
@petmor84 We have replied to your DMs Peter, please check our message.
@petmor84 Hola Peter, did you purchase your tickets directly with us? Please send us a DM with your ticket number so we can verify the status of your request. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@felix10501254 Hola Felix, please send us a direct message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with details about your comment so we can review internally. Kind regards.
@MichaelChrysta5 Hola Michael, please send us a direct message to https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with all the details about your comment so we can help you.  Kind regards.
@Garuyi Hola Garuyi, send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with the details of your comment so we can review internally. Kind regards.

@ArielMWarren Hola Ariel, we are not entirely clear about the details of your comment. Please could you send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with the information so that we can guide you correctly. Kind regards.
@XC4R105 Thanks for the information Carlos, we will review. Regards
@HugoAlb66460678 Hola Hugo, te hemos enviado respuesta por medio de nuestra conversación vía MD. Continuamos nuestra comuncación por ese medio. Un salduo.
@Radlaura66 Hola Laura, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Radlaura66 Hola Laura, we don´t know the details of what happened, please send a DM with more information so we can help you. We remain at your disposal, regards
@clangchico Hola Clangton, we understand that as soon as there is any update on your MacBook you will receive an email notifying. Regards

data.text: @XC4R105 Hola Carlos, you can send your file number to review by DM? Thank you.
@BostonB44180525 Hola, please send us a DM with all the details of your case. Kind regards.
@sarahlaclau We have insisted with the department in charge and we'll get back to you once we have information about your case, Sarah. We appreciate your patience. Regards
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah. The area in charge continues to work on your case, as soon as there is any news we will inform you. Regards

@BrendaJ7777 Hola Brenda. We are sorry to read about this, if you wish, please provide us  the details of what happened via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII . We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@nenecany Hola Amanda, thank you for letting us know the problem was solved. We will share your comments internally in order this reach out to our customer service colleague. Regards
@ArielMWarren Hola Ariel, we are sorry to read about this, the last flight in the booking was operated by us? if so, did you make a formal delay claim at the airport? Regards
@tontadelculobr Hola, vemos que tu segunda maleta aún sigue en proceso de búsqueda. En cuanto haya alguna novedad, te lo notificarán vía SMS o correo electrónico. Saludos.
@YurleeRoyal Hola, we've replied the DM 7 minutes ago. Could you please double check?
@traxoid Hola, yes, we can see that the flight is confirmed. If you received an email stating otherwise, please send us a DM with your booking code and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@YurleeRoyal Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please delete the public tweet where you posted the PIR reference number and send us a DM with such number and your full name. We kindly ask you to avoid posting this kind of info on public chats https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

data.text: @susanwagland Hola Susan, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@clarew Thank you Clare, we have replied your DM. Regards
@ScandiMumOfFour Hola, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we have escalated your case, as soon as we have any update, we'll contact you by DM. Regards
@Yeliz30170546 Hola Yel, we are sorry to read this, as we told you  before, we can not give you a different answer from this channel, we appreciate your understanding. Regards
@clarew Hola Clare, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance

@Jameswi87127688 Hola James, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM all details of your booking code, ticket number, registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@katefroehlich46 Kate, we have asked our colleagues from the responsible department for updates about your case. As soon as we have response from them, we will contact you again. Regards

@AcbroAirlines Ryan, we are sorry that we cannot tell you anything different from what we have previously indicated, our colleagues will notify you in case of any update on the delivery process. We appreciate your patience. Regards.

@AcbroAirlines If you require assistance or additional information, we suggest you contact our colleagues in the baggage department directly at the telephone number that we sent you in previous messages. Kind regards. 2/
@AcbroAirlines Ryan, we inform you that the status of your luggage is "In process of delivery". The time may vary depending on the carrier. 1/
@katefroehlich46 Thanks for confirming us, Kate. From this department we remain at your disposal in case of any additional questions during the process. Kind regards.

@GeorgeForth We appreciate the feedback, George. We'll take it in consideration in order to provide a better online experience. Please let us know in case you need further assistance. Sorry for any inconvenience
@GeorgeForth Hola George, we're sorry to read this. May we assist you with a specific query? If so, please send us the details via DM https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@HugoAlb66460678 Hola Hugo. Sentimos las molestias presentadas, pero hace parte del proceso la solicitud de documentos para su revisión. Deberás estar pendiente de tu correo electrónico en caso de cualquier actualización. Agradecemos tu paciencia. Saludos.
@katefroehlich46 Sorry for the inconvenience, Kate. Our colleagues sent you a new email today. Please check all folders, including the spam. Kind regards

@SueSuemccall Hola Sue, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. We'll take your comments in consideration in order to improve the quality of our meal service. We remain at your disposal

data.text: @dawn_skelton63 Hola Dawn, sorry to read this. Which airline operated the last flight in your itinerary? If it was us, please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@m1ssyoung Hola Caroline, sorry to read this. We've replied your DMs. Please check

@hannahmindel Hola Hannah, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number, registered email in order to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@KnockedHighfie1 Hola, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket numbegistered email, full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@LukasSp13 Hola Lukas, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, registered email, full passenger mail in order to verify the information ? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@AcbroAirlines We reiterate our apologies and remain very attentive to your case. Kind regards.

@AcbroAirlines We hope that they can communicate before you change the place of your stay. You can also check the status of the case by contacting our Baggage Center (https://t.co/ci7QjJwKET). Kind regards.
@AcbroAirlines Hello, Ryan. We are very sorry for the delay in the process, we hope to have an update as soon as possible. Kind regards.
@katefroehlich46 Hello. We are very sorry for the inconvenience that may have arisen. From here we remain at your disposal. Kind regards.
